sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Firefighters battling a blaze at a corn storage facility in Ukraine.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: The attack was part of a massive overnight strike by Russia, with Kiev claiming to have destroyed most of the cruise missiles and drones launched.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Ukraine says at least three people died in the intense shelling, which came after Moscow warned there would be consequences for attacks on Russian vessels in the Black Sea.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In a tweet, Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky said a bomb had hit a blood transfusion center in Kupyansk, which he described as a war crime.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Most of the overnight attacks appeared to be concentrated in the west of the country.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: In Russia, flights from Moscow's second-largest airport were briefly suspended on Sunday morning following a foiled drone attack.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: Meanwhile, a video published on Sunday on a telegram channel associated with the Wagner mercenary group appears to show its boss, Yevgeny Prigozhin, speaking about Ukrainian war tactics and criticizing Russia's defense ministry.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Workers have begun to install the Ukrainian coat of arms on the Motherland Monument in Kyiv.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The trident is to permanently replace the Soviet hammer and sickle, which were removed from the monument shield earlier in the week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Inaugurated in 1981, the Motherland Monument is over 62 metres high and carries a sword in her right hand and a shield in her left.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: The work is scheduled to be completed in time for Ukraine's Independence Day on the 24th of August. After the emblem was installed the Ukrainian flag was raised above the shield.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: A deadline for coup leaders to reinstate the civil government in Niger expires on

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Sunday with no sign the military junta will comply. The ultimatum was presented by the bloc of West African nations known as ECOWAS a week ago after the military toppled elected president Mohamed Bazoum. Failure to reinstate him opens up the possibility of using force. We want diplomacy to work and we want this message clearly transmitted to the leaders of the junta in Niger that we are giving them every opportunity to reverse what they have done.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: But that hasn't happened and there's no sign it will.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: The coup leaders have severed military cooperation with former colonial rulers France and there are reports in Western media that they've requested help from the Russian mercenary group Wagner.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: On the streets of the capital, protesters voiced support for the takeover, but just how much it is backed by the people is unclear.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Around one and a half million young people gathered in a park in Lisbon on Saturday to hear a message of hope from the Pope.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Francis is in the Portuguese capital as part of the celebrations for World Youth Day. La única oportunidad, el único momento que es lícito mirar a una persona de arriba abajo es para ayudar a levantarse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: ¿Cuántas veces vemos gente que nos mira así, por sobre el hombro, de arriba para abajo?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_00
sentences.sentence: Es triste. Thank you.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In the Philippines, one person died and nearly 100 were rescued after a ferry struck floating debris at sea and began taking on water on Saturday.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Police say the accident was the third to hit the country in just over a week.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: All those on board were rescued except for a female passenger who suffered a heart attack and died during the scramble for safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Sea accidents are common in the Philippines because of frequent storms, poorly maintained boats, overcrowding and the weak enforcement of safety regulations.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Thousands of people gather in Hiroshima in memory of the victims of the US atomic bombing of the Japanese city 78 years ago.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Participants, most of them dressed in black, said a silent prayer at the exact time the first nuclear weapon ever used in war was dropped on the city.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Around 140,000 people died in the attack on the 6th August 1945 and a further 74,000 in the atomic bombing of Nagasaki three days later.
